If anyone thats complaining wants to get there ass out here and fix the  
damn ark there welcome to it! What ever the orignal plan were you sure as 
hell didn't follow so I don't want to hear that bullshit unless your out 
here trying to do something to make it better. So if you can't build a 
engine what are you going to teleport one here? The old engine with a few 
new parts even if the years apart would still have chance of working.
